name: Death Wish (Retrochamber Games, Bronson92)
description:
Run and timing Gun.

Make it through a post-apocalyptic urban environment.

Kill as many enemies as possible and get to the end as fast as you can, in a speed runner kind of fashion.

Controls:
Move: AD
Jump: Space
Shoot: Left Mouse Btn

This game was made for gamedevtv-jam-2022

Created by Johannes and Joakim @ Retrochamber Games

Edit:
Bug fix: Trigger Game Over when reach end
